fields.name: I sure do love making fences. I have one rule though:
fields.value:
they are only to be made with wood.
Attack: None
Defense: None

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: At night, choose any number of players to make a fence around. It must include yourself and at least one other person.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: If someone from outside the fence attacks someone inside the fence and it is the only attack of this kind, the defender has Invincible defense.
